component.name: Chiaki
component.summary: Free and Open Source Client for PlayStation 4 Remote Play

description.p: Chiaki is a Free and Open Source Client for PlayStation 4 Remote Play. It can be used to play in real time on a PlayStation 4 as long as there is a network connection.
For more information and instructions how to use Chiaki, please refer to the official documentation: https://github.com/thestr4ng3r/chiaki/blob/master/README.md#usage
